ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_WORKGROUP_STATUS
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Define the status of the workgroup

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MANAGER_AUTH_REFUND_TENDER
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Authorisation of Manager when the tender is not eligible for refund
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Prompt for manager authorisation when the tender is not eligible for refund

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MANAGER_AUTH_EXPIRED_CREDIT_NOTE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Auth for redeeming an expired credit note
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify if manager authorisation is required when redeeming an expired credit note

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_RTN_PERIOD_OVERRIDE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Set the override return eligible period
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allow returns with receipt beyond the eligibility period

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_ITM_DISC_OVRRID
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Auth for item discount limit exceeded
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if manager authorisation is required when the item discount exceeds the cashier limit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TRNS_DISC_AUTH
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if manager authorisation is required during the transaction discount

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_MANAGER_AUTH_MULTIPLE_REGISTERS_LOGIN
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Login into multiple registers within store with manager authorisation
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allow user to login in to multiple registers with in store with manager authorisation

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_TRNS_DISC_OVRRID
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Auth for transaction discount limit exceeded
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify if manager authorisation is required when the transaction discount exceeds the cashier limit

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_ITM_PRICE_OVRRID
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Auth for item priceOveride limit exceeded
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify if manager authorisation is required when the price override exceeds the cashier limit
